21700227_24,s3,T14,T5,23 of 28 sites showing recruitment of both ,Pho2, and ,Pho4," are regulated by both factors (p = 8.1 x 10-16, Fisher's exact test), and none of the Pho4-only recruited sites is regulated by Pho4 (p = 0.003, Fisher's exact test).
